titles: The English globe being a stabil and immobil one, performing what the ordinary globes do, and much more / invented and described by the Right Honorable, the Earl of Castlemaine ; and now publish't by Joseph Moxon ...
author: Castlemaine, Roger Palmer, Earl of, 1634-1705.
Moxon, Joseph, 1627-1691.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
